org.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id INNER JOIN trackers ON trackers.id = issues.tracker_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id INNER JOIN enumerations ON enumerations.id = issues.priority_id AND enumerations.type IN ('IssuePriority') WHERE issues.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT issue_relations.issue_from_id FROM issue_relations WHERE issue_relations.relation_type = 'relates') OR issues.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT issue_relations.issue_to_id FROM issue_relations WHERE issue_relations.relation_type = 'relates')
